channel.description: This chapter describes the following major topics: [ {.c37}]{.c36}Understand file systems and their benefits, categories, and types [ {.c37}]{.c36}Review file system types: Ext3/Ext4, XFS, VFAT, and ISO9660 [ {.c37}]{.c36}Know file system administration commandset [ {.c37}]{.c36}Mount and unmount file systems manually and persistently [ {.c37}]{.c36}Determine and use UUID [ {.c37}]{.c36}Apply and use file system label [ {.c37}]{.c36}Monitor file system and directory usage [ {.c37}]{.c36}Create and mount different types of local file systems in partitions
